skill.name: projection-patterns
skill.description: Build read models and projections from event streams. Use when implementing CQRS read sides, building materialized views, or optimizing query performance in event-sourced systems.
skill.summary: Build read models and projections from event streams. Use when implementing CQRS read sides, buildin...

security_audit.summary: No data theft or malicious execution patterns detected. The content is instructional templates and design guidance without system access or network code.

content.value_statement: Event streams are hard to query for real time views. This skill provides projection patterns and templates to build reliable read models.
actual_capabilities: Explain projection architecture and core types
Provide a basic projector with checkpoint handling
Show an order summary projection with SQL updates
Show an Elasticsearch projection for search indexing
Demonstrate aggregating and multi table projections
limitations: Does not implement a full event store
Does not provision databases or infrastructure
Does not cover authorization or data privacy policies

use_cases.title: CQRS read model
use_cases.description: Design a projection pipeline for query optimized views in an event sourced service.

use_cases.title: Reporting aggregates
use_cases.description: Create daily summary projections for reporting tables and dashboards.

use_cases.title: Search indexing
use_cases.description: Project domain events into Elasticsearch for fast product search.

prompt_templates.title: Start a projector
prompt_templates.prompt: Outline a basic projection architecture and a projector loop with checkpointing for my event store.

prompt_templates.title: Order summary view
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a projection that builds an order summary table from OrderCreated and OrderItem events.

prompt_templates.title: Search projection
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a projection that indexes product events into Elasticsearch with update and delete handling.

prompt_templates.title: Multi table projection
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a transactional projection that updates customers, activity summary, and order history tables.

output_examples.input: Create a daily sales projection design with checkpoints and rebuild steps.
output: Define event handlers for OrderCompleted and OrderRefunded
Store a checkpoint per projection name
Provide a rebuild workflow that resets checkpoints

best_practices: Make projections idempotent to support replays
Store checkpoints to resume after failures
Use transactions for multi table updates
anti_patterns: Coupling multiple projections into one handler
Skipping ordering guarantees in event processing

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude and Codex?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides guidance and templates that work in Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It is a design guide and does not ship a runnable event store or deployment stack.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my event store?
faq.answer: Yes, you can adapt the projector interface to your event store read APIs.

faq.question: Does it access my data or secrets?
faq.answer: No, the skill content has no code that reads files or sends network data.

faq.question: What if my projection lags behind?
faq.answer: Monitor lag and increase batch size or scale processors based on backlog.

faq.question: How does it compare to a CQRS framework?
faq.answer: It offers patterns and examples, while frameworks provide runtime components and tooling.
